mapper.insert: insert into users (id, username, password, nickname, type, status, score, regist_time, picture_address, phone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pictureAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=BIGINT}, regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, picture_address = #{pictureAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select 'true' as QUERYID,id, username, password, nickname, type, status, score, regist_time, picture_address, phone from users where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, nickname, type, status, score, regist_time, picture_address, phone from users
